original_text: He who supplies seed to the sower and bread for food will supply and multiply your seed for sowing and increase the harvest of your righteousness.
korean_text: 심는 자에게 씨와 먹을 양식을 주시는 이가 너희 심을 것을 주사 풍성하게 하시고 너희 의의 열매를 더하게 하시리니

sentences.original_text: He who supplies seed to the sower
will supply and multiply your seed for sowing
and increase the harvest of your righteousness
